description.value:
Youâ€™ve trained with weapons ideally suited to marshes and dense forests. You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Blowgun]{Blowguns}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Hatchet]{Hatchets}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Scythe]{Scythes}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Shortbow]{Shortbows}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Composite Shortbow]{Composite Shortbows}.

You also gain access to all uncommon grippli weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial grippli weapons are simple weapons, and advanced grippli weapons are martial weapons.
